flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on itsnbody to amplify its psychic power wavesnfor gaining total control over its foe.fWhen this POKéMON uses its specialnpower, its snorting breath growsnlabored.
GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on itsnbody to wield its fantastic powers.nWhen it is doing so, it dances bizarrely.fThis POKéMON’s black pearls are valuablenas works of art.
It stores power in the black pearls on itsnforehead. When it uses psychic power, itnperforms an odd dance step. Its style ofndancing became hugely popular overseas.
It can gain control over foes by doingnodd dance steps. The black pearls on itsnforehead are precious gems.
It can gain control over foes by doingnodd dance steps. The black pearls on itsnforehead are precious gems.
It uses black pearls to amplify itsnpsycho-power. It does an oddndance to gain control over foes.
It uses black pearls to amplify itsnpsycho-power. It does an oddndance to gain control over foes.
It uses black pearls to amplify itsnpsycho-power. It does an oddndance to gain control over foes.
It can perform odd dance steps toninfluence foes. Its style of dancingnbecame hugely popular overseas.
It can perform odd dance steps toninfluence foes. Its style of dancingnbecame hugely popular overseas.
Les perles noires amplifient sesnpouvoirs psy. Sa danse étrange luinpermet de contrôler ses ennemis.
It uses black pearls to amplify itsnpsycho-power. It does an oddndance to gain control over foes.
Les perles noires amplifient sesnpouvoirs psy. Sa danse étrange luinpermet de contrôler ses ennemis.
It uses black pearls to amplify itsnpsycho-power. It does an oddndance to gain control over foes.
It uses black pearls to amplify itsnpsychic power. It does a strangendance to control foes’ minds.
It uses black pearls to amplify itsnpsychic power. It does a strangendance to control foes’ minds.
くろしんじゅで　サイコパワーをnつよめ　きみょうな　ステップでnあいての　こころを　あやつるぞ。
흑진주로 사이코 파워를n강하게 하여 기묘한 스텝으로n상대의 마음을 조종한다.
Les perles noires amplifient ses pouvoirs psychiques,nlui permettant de contrôler ses ennemis avec sa dansenétrange.
Mit schwarzen Perlen verstärkt es seine Psycho-Kräfte.nMit einem Tanz kontrolliert es seine Gegner.
Las perlas negras aumentan sus poderes psíquicos.nControla las mentes de sus rivales con un extrañonbaile.
Amplifica i suoi poteri psichici con le sue perle nere.nSi esibisce anche in danze bizzarre per controllareni suoi nemici.
It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power.nIt does a strange dance to control foes’ minds.
黒真珠で　サイコパワーをn強め　奇妙な　ステップでn相手の　心を　操るぞ。
くろしんじゅで　サイコパワーをnぞうふくさせる。ふしぎな　ステップでnあいての　こころを　あやつる。
흑진주로 사이코 파워를n증폭시킨다. 이상한 스텝으로n상대의 마음을 조종한다.
Les perles noires amplifient ses pouvoirs psy.nSa danse étrange lui permet de contrôler ses ennemis.
Mit schwarzen Perlen verstärkt es seine Psycho-Kräfte.nMit einem Tanz kontrolliert es seine Gegner.
Usa perlas negras para potenciar sus poderesnpsíquicos. Con su raro baile controla a los rivales.
Usa perle nere per amplificare i suoi poteri psichici.nCon una danza acquisisce controllo sul nemico.
It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power.nIt does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
黒真珠で　サイコパワーをn増幅させる。不思議な　ステップでn相手の　心を　操る。
サイコパワーの　はどうを　くろしんじゅで　つよめnじゆうじざいに　あいてを　あやつる　ポケモン。nちからを　つかうとき　はないきが　あらくなるぞ。
사이코 파워의 파동을 흑진주로 강화해n자유자재로 상대를 조종하는 포켓몬이다.n힘을 사용할 때 콧김이 거칠어진다.

Groret utilise les perles noires situées sur son corps pournamplifier la puissance de ses ondes psychiques et prendrenle contrôle de son ennemi. Quand il utilise son pouvoir spécial,nce Pokémon a du mal à respirer.
Groink benutzt die schwarzen Perlen an seinem Körper dazu,ndie psychischen Kraftwellen zu verstärken. Wenn es diesenspezielle Fähigkeit nutzt, wird sein schnaubender Atemnschwerfällig.
Grumpig usa las perlas negras que tiene para amplificar lasnondas de su poder psíquico y controlar del todo al rival.nCuando usa su poder especial, le cuesta respirar y resoplancon pesadez.
Grumpig usa le perle nere del suo corpo per amplificarenle onde psichiche e acquisire il pieno controllo del nemico.nQuando usa i suoi speciali poteri, il suo respiro diventanaffannoso.
Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to amplify itsnpsychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe.nWhen this Pokémon uses its special power, its snorting breathngrows labored.
サイコパワーの　波動を　黒真珠で　強めn自由自在に　相手を　操る　ポケモン。n力を　使うとき　鼻息が　荒くなるぞ。
くろしんじゅを　りようして　ふしぎな　ちからをnつかうとき　きみょうな　ステップで　おどりだす。nくろしんじゅは　びじゅつひんの　かちを　もつ。
흑진주를 이용하여 이상한 힘을n사용할 때 기묘한 스텝으로 춤을 춘다.n흑진주는 미술품으로서의 가치를 지녔다.
Groret utilise les perles noires sur son corps pour exercernses formidables pouvoirs. Quand il est en action, il entamenune étrange danse. Les perles noires de ce Pokémonnont une valeur inestimable.

Groink benutzt die schwarzen Perlen an seinem Körper,num seine fantastischen Kräfte nutzen zu können. Dabeintanzt es sonderbar. Die schwarzen Perlen dieses Pokémonnsind wahre Kunstwerke und ebenso wertvoll.
Grumpig utiliza las perlas negras que tiene para usarnfantásticos poderes mientras baila de forma muy extraña. Lasnperlas de este Pokémon están consideradas como valiosasnobras de arte.
Grumpig usa le perle nere che ha sul corpo per esercitareni suoi fantastici poteri. In queste occasioni danza in modonbizzarro. Le perle nere di questo Pokémon sono preziosenopere d’arte.
Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wieldnits fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely.nThis Pokémon’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.
黒真珠を　利用して　不思議な　力をn使うとき　奇妙な　ステップで　踊りだす。n黒真珠は　美術品の　価値を　持つ。
